title: Combine Day 2: Lovie Smith, Lance Zierlein & Matt Money Smith
itunes:title: Combine Day 2: Lovie Smith, Lance Zierlein & Matt Money Smith
description:
A convention center filled with some heroes- Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Gregg Rosenthal and Colleen Wolfe bring you all of the latest news surrounding the second day of the combine. Head Coach of the Houston Texans Lovie Smith stops by and so does Bengals Director of Personnel Duke Tobin. We close the show with some hot sizzling draft analysis with Matt Money Smith and Lance Zierlein.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
